name: entity
description: Generate an MCBE entity (Beta) (more like early Alpha)

options.name: generate
options.description: What to generate for the entity

options.name: identifier
options.description: The identifier of the entity in %s:%s format

options.name: texture_file
options.description: Entity texture file in PNG format

options.name: model_file
options.description: Entity model file in JSON format

options.name: is_spawnable
options.description: Can the entity be spawned using spawn eggs?

options.name: is_summonable
options.description: Can the entity be summoned using commands?

options.name: basic_beh
options.description: Pick "True" or dire things may happen

options.name: spawn_egg_overlay
options.description: The overlay color of the spawn egg in hex format

options.name: spawn_egg_base
options.description: The base color of the spawn egg in hex format
